module.name: fstools
module.summary: Tools for filesystem management, such as mkfs and fsck.

interface.name: fstools_domtrans
interface.summary: Execute fs tools in the fstools domain.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the process performing this action.

interface.name: fstools_run
interface.summary: Execute fs tools in the fstools domain, and allow the specified role the fs tools domain.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the process performing this action.

param.name: role
param.summary: The role to be allowed the fs tools domain.

param.name: terminal
param.summary: The type of the terminal allow the fs tools domain to use.

interface.name: fstools_exec
interface.summary: Execute fsadm in the caller domain.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the process performing this action.

interface.name: fstools_relabelto_entry_files
interface.summary: Relabel a file to the type used by the filesystem tools programs.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the process performing this action.

interface.name: fstools_manage_entry_files
interface.summary: Create, read, write, and delete a file used by the filesystem tools programs.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the process performing this action.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the process performing this action.
